main

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the computer behind the game. It waits for user inputs, next checks the move and does it if it is valid. But if not, it also undoes the turn and asks the user to input a new move. Castlings, default set ups and drawing figures are implemented here too.
    Author:
    Timon Borter
